creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: loose line drawing of a man sitting in a rocking chair; rocking chair faces to the left of the picture plane
inscription:
Inscribed in pencil, bottom edge: 2381 Torson
Inscribed in pencil, verso, LR: Torson | #48 | WH SILK | D34
markings:
Stamp, verso, UL: 366
Stamp on mount and frame: 2381
provenance: The artist, Estate of the artist (Inv. no. 366); [Kraushaar Galleries, New York, purchased from artist's estate Feb. 24, 1961]; [John A. Torson, New York; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; given to MIA, 2015.
title: Man in a Rocking Chair
